content: I'd love to dive deeper into the history of musical theater and Broadway. I've already started reading a book about the history of Broadway, but I'm excited to explore more titles. The recommendations you provided are really helpful, especially the ones that offer a more behind-the-scenes look at the industry. I think I'll start with "Broadway: The Golden Age" and "Razzle Dazzle: The Battle for Broadway" - they sound fascinating!
